# camel-2-dash
transform a string from camelCase to dash-style

## Install

```bash
npm i --save camel-2-dash
```

## Usage

```javascript
var camel2Dash = require('camel-2-dash');

var str = 'camelCaseStr';

console.log(camel2Dash(str)) // ==> camel-case-str
```
